item.title: Youth Clubs Resume
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: New Start days and times: Impact Club is now from 6 to 7pm on Tuesday Nights and Teens Cafe is Thursday nights at the same time of 7 to 8pm.

item.title: Teens Cafe
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: All S1 - S3's Welcome to the Teens Cafe! Looking for a place to hang out, have fun, and connect with friends after school?

item.title: Jungle Explorers Holiday Club
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: Join Us for an Unforgettable Adventure at the Jungle Explorers Holiday Club! Attention all Explorers: Get ready to embark on an epic adventure this summer!

item.title: Youth Camp Update
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: Free Church Youth Camps are a great way for kids to learn more about Jesus and grow friendships with other young Christians This year, five kids from Charleston attended the Renfrew Free Church Kids Camp.

item.title: Holiday Club
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: Holiday Club for Primary Age Youths - 3rd to 6th July 2023 Calling all buckaroos and cowgirls! Get ready for an action-packed journey into the Wild West at our Church Holiday Club.

item.description: Impact club is for all primary school students P1 - P7 during term time üåü Join Impact Youth Club: Fun, Friendship, and Faith!

item.title: Wee Rascals Toddler Group
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: We are thrilled to extend a warm invitation to all parents/guardians and their adorable toddlers to join the Wee Rascals Baby and Toddler Group at Charleston Community Church.
